alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Perry (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Crawford and northeastern Perry Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 431 PM EDT/331 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Carefree Town, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Crawford and northeastern Perry Counties, including the following locations... Cape Sandy, Oriole, Fredonia, Beechwood, Mount Pleasant, West Fork, Deuchars, Branchville, Sulphur and Leopold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
